content.text:
# List of wars involving South Sudan

This is a list of wars involving the Republic of South Sudan.

About 200 Iraqi soldiers were allegedly killed, and the site of their remains became known as "Jebel Iraqi". The International Institute for Strategic Studies also stated that Iraqi forces fought alongside Sudanese government troops. }} }}
